title: Deon Ethics Checklist
description: Open source checklist for data science projects providing concrete and actionable reminders to developers. Learn more here: http://deon.drivendata.org/

title: Datasheet for Datasets
description: Proposal by Gebru et al. for documenting datasets in a way that's similar to other technical fields, like electronics. Primarily for datasets. Learn more here: https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.09010

title: Model Card
description: Framework by Mitchell et al. for encouraging transparent model reporting. Primarily for models. Learn more here: https://arxiv.org/abs/1810.03993

title: Custom
description: Import an existing template or Deon checklist.

title: Blank
description: Make your own template from scratch!
